Literature.Title: Mining Amphibian and Insect Transcriptomes for Antimicrobial Peptide Sequences with rAMPage.
Literature.Author: Lin D, Sutherland D, Aninta SI, Louie N, Nip KM, Li C, Yanai A, Coombe L, Warren RL, Helbing CC, Hoang LMN, Birol I

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2-4µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC=4-8µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis(MIC=16-32µg/ml)
